    • packZipFile

      static void packZipFile​(String zipFilePath, String worldFilePath, String logsFilePath) throws IOException
      Packs the provided latest.log File and World File into the provided ZIP-File.
      Parameters:
      zipFilePath - the full Filepath of the ZIP-File
      worldFilePath - the full Filepath of the World File
      logsFilePath - the full Filepath of the latest.log File
      Throws:
      IOException

    • zipToHash

      static String zipToHash​(File zipFile) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Hashes a ZIP-File.
      Parameters:
      zipFile - the file that should be converted into a Hash value.
      Returns:
      the hash of the ZIP-File in String form.
      Throws:
      IOException - if opening and reading the ZIP-File failed
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm doesn't exist, can be ignored

    • makeRequest

      static com.google.gson.JsonObject makeRequest​(com.google.gson.JsonObject input, String url) throws IOException
      Makes a post request with the provided JSON to the provided URL
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to make the post request to
      input - the JsonObject to be posted
      Returns:
      the response of the server in form of a JsonObject
      Throws:
      IOException - if the request response code is not 200 or any other I/O exception occurred when making the request
